stories.title: Get RACING GAME Node by ID
stories.userStory:
As an API consumer
I want to be able to request a specific RACING GAME
So I can find out all the details about it when I only have its ID
specificationList: The requested RACING GAME node is returned when the provided ID is valid. -> Status Code `200`
A successful request returns the node with all specified properties.
Properties are returned, even when they are empty (optional fields). They are returned with value `null`.
Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This case can happen when there exists no node with that ID or when the node is not from type RACING GAME. -> Status Code `404`

acceptanceCriteria.title: Requesting a RACING GAME with a valid ID returns the respective node
acceptanceCriteria.description: An ID is deemed valid when there exists a node with that ID AND the node is from type RACING GAME.

tests.title: Requesting a RACING GAME with valid ID
tests.gherkin:
Given there exists a "RACING GAME" "F1 2025"
When the user requests the "RACING GAME" "F1 2025"
Then the response should return with status code 200
And the response should return the "RACING GAME" "F1 2025"

acceptanceCriteria.title: Requests are rejected when there exists no RACING GAME with the provided ID
acceptanceCriteria.description:
When there exists no node with the provided ID -> rejected.
When there exists a node with the provided ID, but it is not from type RACING GAME -> rejected.

tests.title: Requesting a RACING GAME with invalid ID
tests.gherkin:
When the user requests a non-existing "RACING GAME"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404
